page.title: 04RECENT HOUSING
page.content: In the last 15 years there has been private housing development on the site of the former manor house estate. Building has also taken place on former farmland. The estates consist of semi-detached and detached houses with adjoining gardens. The houses are well appointed inside and are constructed mainly of brick with roughcast or stone facings.The more expensive houses have integral garages, split level design and individual character. The former estate land has been landscaped to provide an attractive, partly wooded environment with the provision of playgrounds and walkways. The estates are well served by avenues and cul-de-sacs connected to new roads.The new village planning is trying to retain the former rural character of the area.
